## MessageBuilder.createCommitMessage() method

Creates an event commit message.

**Signature:**

```typescript
createCommitMessage<T = any>(eventName: string, params?: CommitParams): Message<T>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  eventName | string | The event name. |
|  params | [CommitParams](./foundation-comms.commitparams.md) | _(Optional)_ The additional parameters. |

**Returns:**

[Message](./foundation-comms.message.md)&lt;T&gt;

The commit message.
